name: Lewis H. REYNOLDS, Appellant, v. Gary REIHART and Hartford Insurance Group

judges: Before O’BRIEN, C. J., and ROBERTS, NIX, LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDERMOTT and HUTCHINSON, JJ.
parties: Lewis H. REYNOLDS, Appellant, v. Gary REIHART and Hartford Insurance Group.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
Appeal dismissed as having been improvidently granted. 47 Pa. Cm with. 602, 408 A.2d 897.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

attorneys: Julius E. Fioravanti, Philadelphia, for appellant.
James K. Thomas, Harrisburg, for Hartford Ins.
casebody.head_matter:
445 A.2d 103
Lewis H. REYNOLDS, Appellant, v. Gary REIHART and Hartford Insurance Group.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued April 13, 1982.
Decided May 19, 1982.
Reconsideration Denied July 19, 1982.
Julius E. Fioravanti, Philadelphia, for appellant.
James K. Thomas, Harrisburg, for Hartford Ins.
Before O’BRIEN, C. J., and ROBERTS, NIX, LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDERMOTT and HUTCHINSON, JJ.
